title: Spirit Girlfriend ~ Seems Like I Am the Only One Who Doesn’t Realize That I Have Been Possessed by My Dead Girlfriend~ - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
author: 大崎アイル
description:
My beloved girlfriend Yukina died.

I–Sota Shibuya lost my will to live. One day, she who had died appeared in my dream. Watching the figure of my girlfriend trying to cheer me up, I was supposed to regain my normal life….. I feel like “someone” is always near me. No, I am imagining it right?>
